page.title: 08Shopping in South Benfleet.
page.content: A variety of employment is available locally in trade and industries serving local people.There are 17 hairdressimg establishments,4 Banks,3 firms of Accountants,4 solicitors,3 travel agents,4 Building Societies and 7 firms of Estate Agents.The three super-markets have limited scope,so that many people shop outside this area in Pitsea,Basildon,Hadleigh or Southend. Small general grocers are closing down,but several newsagents are beginning to sell a variety of tinned and packaged food.Local shops cater for gardeners and DIY enthusiasts.This year a very large DIY centre,PAYLESS,has opened in Benfleet and may in time affect the small shops serving the DIY market.Numerous advertisements in Post Offices and newsagents offer services of individual,decorators,plumbers,etc.
